backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with storage and authorization mixins, admin/session management, and numerous types for content, profiles, products, and UI structures.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summarized descriptions for many frontend files, detailing their roles and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/ADMIN_ROUTES.md: Explains where admin routes are defined and documents the /admin and /admin/login routes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, language provider, layout components, and admin routes for the frontend app.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the bilingual About section with animated stats, icons, and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Provides an access-denied UI for admins with navigation buttons and optional retry handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentBlo: Admin tool for creating content blocks with multilingual fields, optional image upload, and section assignment.
frontend/src/components/admin/Diagnostic: Runs a sequence of admin diagnostics including auth check, product fetch, and CRUD tests, updating status per step. Uses hooks to interact with product APIs and reports progress and errors.
frontend/src/components/admin/HowToOrder: Manages creation and editing of How-To-Order steps with form handling, image uploads, and dialog UI. Fetches existing steps, supports sorting, and updates backend via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/InstagramF: Provides UI to edit Instagram feed settings such as handle, embed code, titles, descriptions, order, and visibility. Loads config via hooks and saves updates through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackagesMa: CRUD manager for packages with form inputs, image upload handling, and confirmation dialogs. Fetches all packages and supports add, edit, and delete operations via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductsMa: Admin interface for managing products including add, edit, delete, image uploads, and validation. Uses product query hooks to load data and perform mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/SectionsMa: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting content sections with image uploads and visibility settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Admin panel for viewing existing admin users and creating new ones through a modal form.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact form component with localized fields, form state handling, and toast-based success feedback.
Fetches and renders dynamic, language-aware sections with optional backgrounds, images, and content blocks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, contact info, navigation shortcuts, social links, and a UI text download action.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with scroll detection, navigation links, mobile menu, and language toggle.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, floating icons, localized titles, and CTA buttons linking to other sections.
frontend/src/components/HowToOrder.tsx: Displays a multi-step ordering guide with icons and translations, including smooth scroll to a contact section.
frontend/src/components/InstagramFeed.ts: Renders an Instagram feed section using admin-configured embed code or handle, with language-based text and intersection animations.
frontend/src/components/Packages.tsx: Shows a grid of predefined product packages with images, tags, and translated names and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Displays a large grid of predefined product items with images, tags, and translated text.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a language context with translation lookup, storing the selected language in localStorage.
frontend/src/EDITING_TEXTS_AND_IMAGES_VI: Brief guide describing where UI text and images are stored for chat-based editing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Handles admin session login, validation with timeout, logout, and persistent session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login flow, stored identities, and exposes identity state through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend operations for user profiles, admin actions, products, packages, sections, and other content.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus light/dark theme CSS variables and a fade‑in animation class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard handling session validation, loading/error states, and navigation to various admin management panels.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Login form for admin users with actor initialization handling and error feedback.
frontend/src/texts/ui-texts.txt: Plain text file containing English and Spanish UI strings keyed for translation.
frontend/src/texts/uiTextsSource.ts: Loads the raw UI text file for use in translation features and downloads.
frontend/src/UI_TEXT_PLAIN_TEXT_WORKFLOW: Documentation describing the plain‑text translation file workflow and how users can download it from the UI.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionStorage.t: Utility for storing, retrieving, and clearing the admin session ID in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/downloadUiTexts.ts: Generates a downloadable file of the raw UI translations using a Blob and temporary URL.
frontend/src/utils/plainTextTranslations: Parses the plain‑text translation file into a key‑based object and provides a translation lookup helper.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash‑based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, including metadata, existing feature definitions, and workflow settings for a translation-download feature.
